paragraphs: I am a cloud-based web developer.
I am proficient in Microsoft stack (Azure Services, ASP.NET, .NET Core/ Framework) and Javascript/Typescript.

My interests are both frontend and backend; for this reason I experienced in both different frontend frameworks (Angular, React and Vue) to create more interactive user interfaces, and backend technologies (.NET Core, and NodeJS) to make performance-oriented API.
In my work experience, I have expanded my knowledge on building business projects (using design patterns) and how to design features that are easy to maintain and control.

In my free time, I keep busy with various hobbies; I am particularly curious about cybersecurity (primarily web security), enjoy listening to podcasts about the world of technology, and enjoy personal fitness and nature, especially the bike.
